mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( id, pass, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, post_code, addr, recommender ) VALUES( #{id}, SHA2(#{pass},512), #{nick_name}, #{membername}, CONCAT(#{birth1},"년 ",#{birth2},"월 ",#{birth3},"일"), #{gender}, CONCAT(#{phone1},"-",#{phone2},"-",#{phone3}), #{addr1}, CONCAT(#{addr2}," ",#{addr3}), #{recommender} )
mapper.select: SELECT midx, id, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, join_date, mileage, grade, del_yn, blacklist_yn, follower_cnt, post_code, addr, profile_system FROM member WHERE del_yn = "N" AND id = #{id} AND pass = SHA2(#{pass},512)
SELECT id FROM member WHERE del_yn = "N" AND membername = #{membername} AND phone = CONCAT(#{phone1},"-",#{phone2},"-",#{phone3})

SELECT midx, id, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, join_date, mileage, grade, del_yn, blacklist_yn, follower_cnt, post_code, addr, profile_system FROM member WHERE del_yn = "N" AND membername = #{membername} AND id = #{id}
